text: Heather Menzies-Urich (born Heather Margaret Brotherston Menzies; December 3, 1949 â€“ December 24, 2017) was a Canadian-American model, activist and actress. She was best known for her roles as Louisa von Trapp in the 1965 movie The Sound of Music and Jessica 6 in the TV series Logan's Run. She was born in Toronto, Ontario. From 1975 until his death in 2002, she was married to actor Robert Urich. Urich died on December 24, 2017 from brain cancer in Quinte West, Ontario at age 68. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site * * Category:1949 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Ontario Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Canadian models Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American activists Category:Models from Utah Category:Actors from Toronto Category:Actors from Utah
title: Heather Menzies
